snippet: BLACK--Hillel, on February 8th at the age of 86. He fought for every moment, savoring life until the end. A man of words and expression, he will be remembered for his contributions and guidance to writers around the globe. He is survived by his children David, Leora and Harry, and daughter-in-law Melissa, grandchildren Benjamin, Jacob and Mitchell. Donations in Hillel's memory may be made to the Southern Poverty Law Center. 1/3
